p: We detected significantly different ADCs of all fatty acid fractions among the microalgal ingredients were significantly different, except for total MUFA, 20:5n3 EPA, and total n-3 PUFA ( Table 10). The ADCs of total PUFA and total n6-PUFA were significantly lower in N. oculata co-product (58% and 55%) than in N. oculata whole cells (74% and 71%). We observed the highest ADC value of total SFA in N. oculata co-product (82%) when compared with N. oculata whole cells (40%).
